product_name: Seattle Sports Eco OptiDry Bag - 40 Liters - Special Buy
long_description: The 40-liter Seattle Sports Eco OptiDry Bag will keep your gear dry during a day of paddling or kayaking. When you need to dig out a jacket or snack, transparent vinyl makes it a cinch to find things.
short_description: The 40-liter Seattle Sports Eco OptiDry Bag will keep your gear dry during a day of paddling or kayaking. When you need to dig out a jacket or snack, transparent vinyl makes it a cinch to find things.
